title: Event Step Configuration
description: Event-driven step that subscribes to 'content-personalized' and handles email delivery with batch processing and rate limiting.

title: Campaign Scheduling Logic
description: Checks if campaign is scheduled for future delivery and stores it for cron job processing, otherwise processes immediately.

title: Batch Email Processing
description: Processes emails in batches with parallel execution and rate limiting to avoid overwhelming the email service.

title: Individual Email Sending
description: Sends individual emails through the email provider and updates email status in state with success/failure tracking.

title: Campaign Metrics Update
description: Updates campaign status and metrics after email delivery completion with success/failure counts.

title: Campaign Completion
description: Emits campaign completion event with delivery statistics and triggers next steps in the workflow.
